description.group_name: The group name can only contain alphanumeric characters and underscores.
description.new_group_name: "{0}" is the current group name. The group name can only contain alphanumeric characters and underscores.
description.group_mask: Determines the group's position in its hierarchy. The lower the mask, the higher the group status.
description.media_alt: A text alternative to the image for screen readers or when the image does not load.
description.media_description: For internal purposes, to help with tracking in searches.
description.media_caption: May be displayed below the image for commentary/description purposes.

error.t: Something went wrong! Please try again.

token_expired.t: Please log in again to continue.

unauthorized.t: You are not authorized to view this page.

user_delete.t: Do you really want to delete user {name}?|Do you really want to delete those {number} users?

group_delete.t: Do you really want to delete group {name}?

blog_post_delete.t: Do you really want to delete blog post {name}?|Do you really want to delete those {number} blog posts?

error.form: Errors were found on this form.

message.user_delete_ok: User {name} was deleted.|The users were deleted.

members.member_search: Type user full name here, i.e 'Jane Doe'
members.user_add_tag: The following users will be added:
members.user_remove_tag: The following users will be removed:
members.user_none: There are no members in this group.
members.current_members: The following users are members of this group:

users.warning1:
Setting individual permissions for this user 
            will override permissions set on groups of which the user is a member.
users.warning2:
We recommend setting permissions on groups instead, 
            and use individual user permissions to handle exceptions.

groups.info1: Permissions for all members of the group are defined here.
groups.info2:
Individual permissions can also be set at the user level,
            in which case user permissions will override permissions set here.

settings.click_default: Click on an avatar to make it the default.
settings.image_uploaded: The avatar has been processed, you can return to the avatar tab.

blog.author: Author
blog.click_featured: Click on an image to make it the featured image for this post.
blog.add_tag_pholder: Type enter to add tag, click to remove
blog.excerpt_label: This user-defined summary of the post can be displayed on the front page.

tables.btn_apply_title: Apply action to all selected users

dropzone.choose_file: Drag and drop your file here (or click to browse)
dropzone.file_too_big: File is too big ({{filesize}} MB, maximum allowed: {{maxFilesize}} MB).
dropzone.invalid_type: This file type is not allowed.
dropzone.max_files_exceeded: The maximum number of files was reached.
